V03vinv06_u:6807: atha bhagavatā rocasya mahāmātrasya tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā yāṃ śrutvā roco mallamahāmātro buddhe 'bhiprasanno dharme saṃghe 'bhiprasannaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:6808: atha roco mallamahāmātraḥ utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāṃjalīṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat* /
V03vinv06_u:6809: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān* śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena /
V03vinv06_u:6811: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān ahaṃ tathā kariṣyāmi yathā pāpeyā mallā (fol. 238v1 = GBM 6.789) anujñāsyanti /
V03vinv06_u:6812: sacet te roca pāpeyā mallā anujñāsyanti evaṃ te 'ham adhivāsayāmi /
V03vinv06_u:6813: atha roco mallamahāmātro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanāt prakrānto yena pāpeyā mallās tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:6815: āgamayantu tāvad bhavanto yāvad ahaṃ tatprathamataraṃ bhagavantaṃ bhojaye bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca /
V03vinv06_u:6816: paścād yuṣmākam api (MSV I 284) na duṣkaraṃ bhaviṣyati bhagavantaṃ bhojayituṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca /
V03vinv06_u:6818: asmābhis tatprathamataraṃ buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgha upanimantrito na vayam anujānīma iti /
V03vinv06_u:6820: yadi nānujānītha ekaṃ khādyakaṃ cārayāmi pānakaṃ ceti /
V03vinv06_u:6823: anujānīmaḥ sacet saṃghagatā tena dakṣiṇā pratiṣṭhāpitā bhavati /
V03vinv06_u:6826: bhavantas tādṛśaṃ khādyakaṃ sajjīkuruta yenaikenaiva paryāptir bhavati ahaṃ sarvopakaraṇāni dadāmīti /
V03vinv06_u:6830: atha pāpeyā mallās tām eva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samudānīya
V03vinv06_u:6831: pūrvavad yāvat purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇāḥ /
V03vinv06_u:6832: tato roco mallamahāmātraḥ khādyakaṃ cārayitum ārabdhaḥ pānakaṃ ca /
V03vinv06_u:6843: pāpeyānāṃ mallānām asāv āhāraḥ paribhogaṃ na gataḥ /
V03vinv06_u:6846: ehi buddha ehi dharma ehi saṃgha idaṃ gṛhāṇeti /
V03vinv06_u:6849: praṣṭavyaḥ kiṃ mamānuprayacchatha āhosvid yo 'sau bhagavān dvipadānām agrya iti /
V03vinv06_u:6850: yadi kathayanti yo 'sau bhagavān dvipadānām agrya iti /
V03vinv06_u:6855: evaṃ dharme vaktavyaṃ yo 'sau virāgāṇām agrya iti /
V03vinv06_u:6856: saṃghe vaktavyaṃ yo 'sau gaṇānām agrya iti /
V03vinv06_u:6860: tena khalu samayenāyuṣmān svātir navāgatas taruṇo 'cirapravrajitaḥ acirāgata imaṃ dharmavinayam* /
V03vinv06_u:6862_0: uktaṃ bhagavatā yaiś cālpaṃ dattaṃ yaiś ca prabhūtaṃ dattaṃ yaiś ca praṇītaṃ dattaṃ
V03vinv06_u:6862_1: yaiś cāttamanaskaiḥ parikarma kṛtaṃ yaiś ca prasannacittair abhyanumoditaṃ (fol. 239r1 = GBM 6.790)
V03vinv06_u:6865: sa kāṣṭhaṃ pāṭayitum ārabdho yāvad anyatamasmāt pūtidārusuṣirān niṣkramyāśīviṣeṇa dakṣiṇe pādāṅguṣṭhe dṛṣṭaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:6866: sa viṣeṇa saṃmūrchito bhūmau patito lālā vāhayati mukhaṃ ca vibhaṇḍayati akṣiṇī ca saṃparivartayati /
V03vinv06_u:6874: yadi na pravrajito 'bhaviṣyat* jñātibhir asya cikitsā kāritā abhaviṣyad iti /
V03vinv06_u:6875: etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata (MSV I 286) ārocayanti /
V03vinv06_u:6884: bhikṣavo na jānate kīdṛśaṃ vikṛtabhojanam iti /
V03vinv06_u:6887: āryā yuṣmākam eva śāstā sarvajño bhagavān sarvadarśī sa eva jñāsyatīti /
V03vinv06_u:6890: vikṛtabhojanaṃ bhikṣava uccāraḥ prasrāvaś chāyikā mṛttikā ca /
V03vinv06_u:6891: tatra uccāraḥ acirajātakānāṃ vatsakānāṃ teṣām eva ca prasrāvaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:6894: mṛttikā pṛthivyāṃ caturaṃgulam apanīyoddhartavyā iti vikṛtabhojanam iti /
V03vinv06_u:6895: tato bhikṣubhir āyuṣmataḥ svāter vikṛtabhojanaṃ dattam* /
V03vinv06_u:6899_0: śakṣyasi tvam ānanda mamāntikān mahāmāyūrīṃ vidyām udgṛhya paryavāpya svāter bhikṣo
V03vinv06_u:6899_1: rakṣāṃ kartuṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca /
V03vinv06_u:6901: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyām imāṃ mahāmāyūrīṃ vidyāṃ bhāṣate sma /
V03vinv06_u:6903: namo buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāya /
V03vinv06_u:6904: tadyathā amale vimale nirmale maṃgale hiraṇye hiraṇyagarbhe bhadre subhadre samantabhadre śrībhadre sarvārthasādhani paramārthasādhani sarvānarthapraśamani /
V03vinv06_u:6909: acyute adbhute atyadbhute mukte mocani mokṣaṇi araje viraje /
V03vinv06_u:6911: amare amaraṇi brahme brahmasvare pūrṇe pūrṇamanorathe mukte jīvati rakṣā svātiṃ sarvopadravabhayarogebhyaḥ svāhā /
V03vinv06_u:6912: evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmān ānando bhagavato 'ntikān mahāmāyūrīṃ vidyām udgṛhya paryavāpya svāter bhikṣoḥ svastyayanaṃ kṛtam* /
V03vinv06_u:6914: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ /
V03vinv06_u:6915: āscaryaṃ bhagavan yāvac ca bhagavatā mahāmāyūrī vidyā upakarā bahukarā ca /
V03vinv06_u:6916: na bhikṣava etarhi yathā mamātīte 'py adhvany akṣaṇapratipannasya (fol. 239v1 = GBM 6.791)
V03vinv06_u:6917: vinipatitaśarīrasyāpi mahāmāyūrī vidyārājā upakarā bahukarā ca / tac chrūyatām* /
V03vinv06_u:6918: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo himavati parvatarāje dakṣiṇe pārśve suvarṇāvabhāso nāma mayūrarājaḥ prativasati sma /
V03vinv06_u:6919: so 'nayā mahāmāyūryā vidyayā kālyaṃ svastyayanaṃ kṛtvā divā svastyayanena viharati /
V03vinv06_u:6920: so 'yaṃ svastyayanaṃ kṛtvā rātrau svastyayanena viharati /
V03vinv06_u:6921_0: so 'pareṇa samayena saṃbahulābhir vanamayūrībhiḥ sārdham ārāmeṇārāmam udyānenodyānaṃ
V03vinv06_u:6921_1: parvatapārśveṇa parvatapārśvam atyarthaṃ kāmarāgaraktaḥ kāme 'nugṛddho grathito mūrchito
V03vinv06_u:6923: sa tatra dīrgharātraṃ pratyarthikaiḥ pratyamitrair hiṃsakair avatāraprekṣibhir mayūrapāśair baddhaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:6924: so 'py atra madhyagataḥ pramūḍhaḥ smṛtiṃ ca labdhvā imām eva mahāmāyūrīṃ vidyāṃ manasyakārṣīt* /
V03vinv06_u:6925_0: tadyathā amale vimale nirmale maṅgalye hiraṇye hiraṇyagarbhe bhadre subhadre samantabhadre
V03vinv06_u:6925_2: manasi mānasi mahāmānasi acyute adbhute atyadbhute mukte mocani mokṣaṇi araje viraje
V03vinv06_u:6925_3: amare amṛte amaraṇi brahme brahmasvare pūrṇe pūrṇamanorathe vimukte jīvati rakṣa
V03vinv06_u:6927: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau suvarṇāvabhāso nāma mayūrarājas tena kālena tena samayena /
V03vinv06_u:6928: tadāpi mama mahāmāyūrī vidyā upakarā ca bahukarā ca etarhy api mama mahāmāyūrī vidyā upakarā ca bahukarā ceti /
V03vinv06_u:6929: paśya bhadanta yāvac ca bhagavataḥ svāter bhikṣor vidyayā svastyayanaṃ kṛtam* /
V03vinv06_u:6930: na bhikṣava etarhi yathātīte 'py adhvani / tac chrūyatām* /
V03vinv06_u:6931: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ nāgamaṇḍaliko 'nyatamaḥ kṣatriyadārakaḥ sarpeṇa dṛṣṭaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:6934: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau nāgamaṇḍalikaḥ ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena /
V03vinv06_u:6935: yo 'sau dārakaḥ svātir bhikṣus tena kālena tena samayena /
